bibl.idno: Entry 10, Record Group 60, Letter Book H

revisionDesc.change: removed spaces surrounding em-dashes and inserted space between initials
checked file for values of @facs, further revised header information, revised encoding
changes to TEI header, including punctuation of titles and replacing initials with full names when possible

body.ab: I am directed by the Acting Attorney General to acknowledge the receipt of yours of the 21st inst. enclosing bill for portrait of Mr. Stanbery.

To fulfil the requirement of the Treasury Department, through which the bills of this Office are paid, you will please forward me yours in duplicate, and receipted, when a check shall be promptly returned.
